block.p: LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Levine of Monsey, N.Y., have announced October wedding plans for their daughter Ellen M. Levine and Robert I. Altman, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Nathan Altman of Marlboro, N.J. Ms. Levine, 28 years old, graduated from Pace University. She is a senior tax analyst with Young & Rubicam in New York.

LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Levine of Monsey, N.Y., have announced October wedding plans for their daughter Ellen M. Levine and Robert I. Altman, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Nathan Altman of Marlboro, N.J. Ms. Levine, 28 years old, graduated from Pace University. She is a senior tax analyst with Young & Rubicam in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Levine of Monsey, N.Y., have announced October wedding plans for their daughter Ellen M. Levine and Robert I. Altman, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Nathan Altman of Marlboro, N.J. Ms. Levine, 28 years old, graduated from Pace University. She is a senior tax analyst with Young & Rubicam in New York. Mr. Altman, 30, graduated from Emory University and is the president of Mortgage Funding in New York.
